desc: OSGi in Action is a comprehensive guide to OSGi with two primary goals. First, it provides a clear introduction to OSGi concepts with examples that are relevant both for architects and developers. The central idea of OSGi is modularity, so you start by learning about OSGi bundles. You'll then see how OSGi handles module lifecycles and follow up with how it promotes service-oriented interaction among application components.
title: OSGi in Action
